response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This unique offering is valued at $800,000 by you, which I find to be a very reasonable assessment. However, considering its exceptional quality and the value it can bring to you, I am extending a special offer at a price of $950,000. This is an exclusive chance for you to secure this valuable asset at a price that is higher than its intrinsic value but still offers a considerable saving compared to its market price. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
